author: GerryOnGithub
body:
Select "Properties" to change Colors. Be unhappy with the results. Attempt to restore the default Colors. Uninstall and reinstall in an attempt to get back to the default colors.

It should somehow be possible to find a light color combination that looks okay, and/or restore the default colors.


Can't restore default colors.

Typical Windows 10 professional PC.

comments.body: @GerryOnGithub The repo is for developers. For support questions please use forums and other support channel.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
@GerryOnGithub can't remember the _exact_ key, but the colors are stored in the registry. I think it might be under `HKCU:\Console`.

Removing those values will cause PS to regenerate the defaults and populate the key.
